attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No further wage rises for MPs for at least the next 2 years - all MPs pensions to be capped to the basic pension that most pensioners have to live on.  Cap on all expenses and they must be only for geniune mps expenses - No one allowed to Flip houses etc.  If they have accomodation given to them to live in whilst an MP then they are not allowed to use public money to re-decorate unless it is nessacery ie;- once every 5/10 years.  They must be made to stop miss-using our hard earned tax payers money.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses and salaries are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
